T02D2917:315b-3: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga /
T02D2917:315b-4: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2917:315b-5: zug rngu'i nyes pa dang bral ba //
T02D2917:315b-6: mi shes mtshan ma spangs pa dang //
T02D2917:315b-7: ma rungs gdon bgegs mi gnas par //
T02D2917:315b-8: dkar zhing gtsang la snum pa'i sar //
T02D2917:315b-9: khru gang kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs //
T02D2917:315b-10: khru phyed thur du brus pa'i khung //
T02D2917:315b-11: kha khyer gyis mdzes zhi ba yi //
T02D2917:315b-12: mtshan ma dkar po'i rdzas kyis byug / dkar zhing dri zhim 'o ma can //
T02D2917:315b-13: reg na zug rngu dang bral ba //
T02D2917:315b-14: zla mdog me tog 'byung ba'i shing //
T02D2917:315b-15: khung dang rjes mthun dbyibs su brtsigs //
T02D2917:315b-16: mchod pa bsregs pa'i yo byad rnams //
T02D2917:315b-17: las dang rjes mthun nyer bsags te //
T02D2917:315b-18: me spar me dbus ram las lha //
T02D2917:315b-19: mdog dkar bgrang phreng dbyu gu dang //
T02D2917:315b-21: yi shes me bkug gnyis med bstim //
T02D2917:315b-22: mchod dang bstod dang bsregs pa'i mthar //
T02D2917:315b-23: slar yang mchod bstod mnyes pa yi //
T02D2917:315b-24: me lha 'bar ba'i me dbus su //
T02D2917:315b-25: rang lhag lhar bskyed ye shes bstim //
T02D2917:315b-26: der yang mchod dang bstod pa dang //
T02D2917:315b-27: bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis mnyes pa dang //
T02D2917:315b-28: mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba gdab //
T02D2917:315b-29: yi ge brgya pas yongs bskang nas //
T02D2917:315b-30: gshegs bsdu slar yang me lha yi //
T02D2917:315b-31: mchod bsreg rdzas kyis tshim byas la //
T02D2917:315b-32: 'dod don las kyi gsol gdab ste //
T02D2917:315b-33: gshegs gsol nye bar bsdu bar bya //
